title: "UFDB Testing"
output: html_test

```{r}
#library(maptools)
library(maps)
library(mapproj)
library(sp)
library(rgdal)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
#Get Extent Shapefile
myDIR <- "C:/ArcGIS/TempSpace.gdb"
extentFILE <- readOGR(myDIR, "NA_Extent")

class(extentFILE)
mode(extentFILE)
length(extentFILE)

#Construct as a DataFrame 
extentDF <- fortify(extentFILE)

class(extentDF)
dim(extentDF)
```

```{r}
#Map Extent
names(extentDF)
ggplot(data = extentDF, aes(x=long,y=lat, group=group)) + geom_path() + coord_map("mercator")
```
